Orange has recorded its first new case of coronavirus in 12 days, the latest infection data from the Western NSW Local Health District has confirmed.

articles.title: More flu vaccines helps Aust health system - The Australian
articles.description: Flu vaccine manufacturing is being ramped up this season in the hope higher public immunity to influenza will free up hospitals to focus on coronavirus.
articles.content:
